title: Frontier Populations
prompt: A long county road stretching toward the horizon under soft morning light, flanked by sparse grassland and distant buttes, with a single pickup truck visible miles away; the composition emphasizes emptiness and scale, taken from ground level with warm amber and dusty ochre tones, conveying the vast distances and isolation that define frontier America. Include the texture of weathered asphalt and muted prairie vegetation in sharp focus, with hazy mountains or flatland receding into soft focus, evoking the quiet weight of geographic remoteness and the time-distance reality of frontier healthcare access.
